meanings.sent1: Muraenids are known for their long, slender bodies.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of muraenids swimming gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: Why did the muraenids organize a talent show? To show off their eel-egant skills!
meanings.sent4: The muraenids slithered through the water like living ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The muraenids, with their snake-like appearance, are fascinating creatures to observe.

meanings.sent1: The muraenids in this tank are all from the same family.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of muraenids to learn more about their family dynamics.
meanings.sent3: The muraenids threw a family reunion party to celebrate their shared ancestry.
meanings.sent4: In the underwater world, the muraenids are the close-knit relatives of the sea creatures.
meanings.sent5: The muraenids stick together like a tight-knit fishy family.
